amendment.description: Amendment reforms and improves the VA Inspector General's ability to report on problems and problem employees at the VA; requires the IG to release reports including employee misconduct to the public and explain what changes the VA has requested; requires the IG to identify a manager responsible for fixing an identified problem; makes it easier to fire an identified employee; and targets the bonuses of employees that fail to solve problems.
